title: Customized Educational Technology Design and Implementation for [K-12] Students with Special Needs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic special education theory and experience with digital educational tools
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing technology-based instructional design methods immediately applicable in special education settings.

learning_goals: Design personalized learning strategies tailored to the needs of students with special educational requirements
Evaluate hardware and software solutions to support children with visual, auditory, or functional difficulties
Execute a process to monitor and improve the effectiveness of educational technology applications based on formative assessment data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
